lexUnit.name: pedal.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: move (a bicycle, pedalo, etc.) by working the pedals.

sentence.text: It was n't clear who was pedalling whose bike as more than a hundred mountain cyclists advanced in a humming phalanx of brightly coloured jerseys from the tiny square in Llanwrtyd Wells , smallest town in Britain .
